comment: Professor Christensen was an Awesome Lab professor. He explained the lab simply and efficiently and let everyone work out what needed to be done, if you needed help just raise your hand and he was there to help. He also is a super easy grader just show your work and you should be fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: physics 2212 lab. Great instructor and very nice and approachable. Several times he took the time to discuss some concepts I was going over in class with another instructor.
Tests are impossible with many people failing.  No curve.  Other professors are much better.  STay far away. .
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Christensen is the best! His tests are straightforward and he's always available to help students. Genuinely one of the nicest professors who really cares about his students.

He really takes time to make sure you understand and it is very clear what he wants you to know. He has lots of practice material posted that helps with the tests. I was afraid I would have to give this class a lot of effort, but he made it simple. I didn't buy the book. Homework questions are a bit excessive, but tests are easier.
An absolute class act. I took him physics 2 lab (calc-based), and I absolutely loved him! Extremely easy on grading, no final, and he drops the lowest lab. TAKE HIM!!!

Fun guy, fun class, knowledgeable professor in general. Makes an otherwise difficult class fun and manageable. Also a total geek, and I mean that in a good way (Its fun when your professor gets inside jokes).

Had him for lecture and lab. He's an AMAZING lab professor. No one got below an A because it's literally impossible. He took the time to explain everything and didn't mind answering questions. Physics is just really hard for me, so lecture was difficult. I'd recommend taking him if you already have some knowledge and don't mind skipping steps.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Nice professor! He literally goes through the lab before you do it. If youre not getting something and you ask him a question he is also willing to help without getting upset. He's so laid back and chill you can tell he actually likes what he does and cares about his students. Not a science major but  one of the best professors i've taken. TAKE HIM

Had him for calc-based physics 1  lab. SO EASY!!! It's basically an A if you show up and follow the lab manual. He's a great guy, and wants you to do well. I'm so glad he's teaching calc-based physics 2 lab next semester! Easiest lab I have ever taken. Such a great guy!!!!!

I took Dr. Christensen for Physics 2. He is an easy grader, but that does not mean the material is easy. In order to get a good grade you still need to know the material. Luckily he does a great job explaining difficult concepts. I would definitely recommend him to anyone needing to take physics 2

Had Dr. C for Phys. 1 and 2. He is a wonderdul lecturer and clearly explains all the information you need for the test. Gives hw that will help with tests and gives partial credit. He has been one of my favorite teachers at KSU and I'm not even a physics student! He is very helpful if you go to him for help and wants all his students to pass.
